about_us1: MyKaraj is an application established in 2020 and headquartered in Dubai that gives users access to garages in the UAE based on their specific needs, car model and location.
about_us2: Listed garages are suggested within the user’s proximity with verified reviews that will guarantee them the best service. Users can book their service through the app, get real-time updates on the status of their car and get notified upon completion of their service.
about_us3: Aside from the wide selection of services available on the application, MyKaraj is also equipped with a history feature that keeps a record of all the services that the user has done in details, allowing them to keep track of the performance of their car.
get_in_tech3: You might just want to chat?
list_your_garage2: We promise not to leave you hanging
list_your_garage3: Want your garage to be listed on the app?
exit-confirm-msg: Are you suer you want to exit MyKaraj?
